duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform research experiments in medical and related technical areas.
Maintain specialized knockout and transgenic mice for basic immunology studies.
Analyze inflammatory molecules at gene and protein levels.
Maintain and manage lab equipment and samples.
Record and maintain organized data of experiments and laboratory equipment.
Order general laboratory supplies and maintain inventory.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in science and 0 to 1 year of experience or Associate's degree in an approved biotechnology program and 0 to 2 years of experience
